mapper.update: update AlarmLine set STCD = #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ItemID = #{itemID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, MinValue = #{minValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MaxValue = #{maxValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ComparedValue = #{comparedValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Color = #{color,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Describe = #{describe,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, STCD, ItemID, Name, MinValue, MaxValue, ComparedValue, Color, Describe from AlarmLine
